articles.title: 8 months into their strike, videogame voice actors say the industry's latest proposal is 'filled with alarming loopholes that will leave our members vulnerable to AI abuse'
articles.description: Progress has been made, but SAG-AFTRA says the two sides in the dispute are still far apart.
